name: Lotus Orb
description: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

abilities.name: Echo Shell
abilities.description: Applies a basic dispel and a shield on the target ally for a while, which re-casts a copy of most single-target abilities targeted at the ally back at their casters. Does not protect the ally from the targeted abilities.
notes: Can be cast on allied heroes, Clones, Illusions, and the Spirit Bear
Can be cast on Creep-heroes as well, but it does not reflect abilities for them
Applies a Basic Dispel on the target upon cast
Spell Reflection triggers before Spell Block, so a blocked ability is still reflected normally
Does not block abilities cast by allies
Does not reflect abilities as a result of other sources of Spell Reflection
Projectile-based abilities are nearly always reflected upon impact
Successive casts on the same target refresh the duration, the buff does not stack

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
